fields.name: owner
docs: The creator of the stake record (32)

fields.name: woolMint
docs: The mint of the token to be given as reward (32)

fields.name: wolfCollection
docs: The verified collection address of the NFT (32)

fields.name: totalReward
docs: The total reward to staking with Wool (8)

fields.name: currentBalance
docs: The current balance in Stake Vault (8)

fields.name: stakeBump
docs: The bump of the stake record PDA (1)

fields.name: nftAuthBump
docs: The bump of the nft authority PDA (1)

errors.name: ReentrancyDetect
errors.msg: Reentrancy Detect

errors.name: StakeBumpError
errors.msg: unable to get stake details bump

errors.name: NftBumpError
errors.msg: unable to get nft record bump

errors.name: InvalidStakedValue
errors.msg: No staked nft to get rewards

errors.name: NegativePeriodValue
errors.msg: the minimum staking period in secs can't be negative

errors.name: InvalidStakeEndTime
errors.msg: stake ends time must be greater than the current time & start time

errors.name: TokenNotNFT
errors.msg: the given mint account doesn't belong to NFT

errors.name: TokenAccountEmpty
errors.msg: the given token account has no token

errors.name: CollectionNotVerified
errors.msg: the collection field in the metadata is not verified

errors.name: InvalidCollection
errors.msg: the collection doesn't match the staking details

errors.name: MaxStakersReached
errors.msg: max staker count reached

errors.name: IneligibleForReward
errors.msg: the minimum stake period for the rewards not completed yet

errors.name: StakingIsOver
errors.msg: the nft stake time is greator than the staking period

errors.name: StakingNotLive
errors.msg: the staking is not yet started

errors.name: StakingInactive
errors.msg: the staking is not currently active

errors.name: InsufficientBalInVault
errors.msg: Insufficient tokens in Vault to extend the period or reward

errors.name: FailedTimeConversion
errors.msg: failed to convert the time to u64

errors.name: FailedWeightConversion
errors.msg: failed to convert the weight to u64

errors.name: ProgramAddError
errors.msg: unable to add the given values

errors.name: ProgramSubError
errors.msg: unable to subtract the given values

errors.name: ProgramMulError
errors.msg: unable to multiply the given values

errors.name: ProgramDivError
errors.msg: unable to divide the given values

errors.name: InvalidUserPool
errors.msg: Invalid User Pool

errors.name: InvalidPoolError
errors.msg: Invalid pool number

errors.name: InvalidNFTAddress
errors.msg: No Matching NFT to withdraw

errors.name: InvalidOwner
errors.msg: NFT Owner key mismatch

errors.name: InvalidWithdrawTime
errors.msg: Staking Locked Now

errors.name: IndexOverflow
errors.msg: Withdraw NFT Index OverFlow

errors.name: LackLamports
errors.msg: Insufficient Lamports

errors.name: VectorLengthMismatch
errors.msg: Vector length mismatch

errors.name: NoStakedNFT
errors.msg: No Staked NFT
